Projects

Current

Commsor provides community leaders with the tools to better grow, engage and make money for their communities. Originally built for the Product Hunt Maker Festival 2019.

Past

Modagrate provided a simple API for developers to integrate AI and human powered content moeration into their app or project.

The Chunk was one of the original Minecraft minigame networks, hosting custom and unique content while supporting thousands of concurrent players. Exited in 2016.
